findStrings.find: Finished text box. Had to revise NVGRect and NVGButton to take rectangles in instead of NVGRectangles so now everything is easier to instantiate. All colors schemes are in the AbstractNVGUI class that is implemented by all NVG for ease of changing colors. I don't think I got all the colors put in the same way they were before so feel free to add more color schemes.

task.summary: Default task
Updated libraries and added NanoVG. Also implemented basic NanoVG Gui.
Updated libraries and added NanoVG. Also implemented basic NanoVG Gui.
Updated libraries and added NanoVG. Also implemented basic NanoVG Gui.
Updated libraries and added NanoVG. Also implemented basic NanoVG Gui.
Added Window3D, an updated version of the Window class so the GUI class can be separated. Also added Roboto.tff for a default font. Currently having issues with font anti-aliasing.

I am comparing our classes with those of an example. The issue currently is that the text is not anti-aliased. I wrote the 'engine' and 'game' packages, they have the aa issue. The example is in the 'NanoTest' package. I have reduced the code as much as possible to only show text. I'm comparing the two right now to find what is going wrong with aa.
Forgot to uncomment code. my b.
Found the antialiasing issue. Have to end drawing shape beforehand, see class gui render()
Got text anti-aliased and working with other shapes. Also reforming classes currently. Just fixed the screen resize so the gui also gets updated correctly.
Added callbacks to render while window is moving or being resized. But window still freezes when just click holding title bar. Might try multithreading.
No multi-threading. Made Window3D an abstract class. GUI now extends Abstract Window to combine their functions and make them easier to access from gameLogic and Engine.
All rendering is done by GUI now.
Basic UI classes created. Box and Panel.
Buttons!!! Button held by panel. It reacts to mouse but doesn't callback yet.
Button prints to system.out when pressed. Button fully functional besides callback.
Button callbacks to where it was instantiated for easy implementation.
NVGText added. Text also added to buttons.
Added some 3d rendering. Colors not yet working
Added some 3d rendering. Colors not yet working
NVGRectangles can be created based off % of screen. They are also centered now.
Added all libraries.
Added all libraries.

Couldn't push for a few days. Many changes. GUI is positioned relative to screen size. GUI also have more constructors for holding different things such as text or UIElements. Window is layered with the window gl on top, the GUI below it, and the 3d rendering at the bottom because that will have the most elaborate code to it. 3D rendering with textures now works!
Basic text input. Rewired some of the AbstractWindow to work with keyboard input.
Constrained textbox to letters and numbers only.
Been working on getting the text gylphs to get text positions for textbox. Works now, not perfectly, but it's functioning.
Got rid of text glyphs. Using an array of ints to show char lengths. It's janky but it will work as long as you don't type 50 lowercase Ls.

Finished text box. Had to revise NVGRect and NVGButton to take rectangles in instead of NVGRectangles so now everything is easier to instantiate. All colors schemes are in the AbstractNVGUI class that is implemented by all NVG for ease of changing colors. I don't think I got all the colors put in the same way they were before so feel free to add more color schemes.
Fixed small error where the blinker was not being scaled properly.
Objects can rotate around themselves instead of the camera now. Also multiple meshes can be rendered.
Splash screen and background changes.
Better 3d controls.
Cleaned up UI and added 3d stage.
